name: Innocent Love v0.1.0
description:
A game that is reminiscent of old classic JRPGs with an emphasis in growing bonds with your friends. Experience this reimagining of an old worn-out, cliche genre.

--STORY--

Thousands of years ago, the Demon Lord Aster ruled the world through sheer chaos and destruction.

People worshiped him over their Goddess who created their existence.
The Goddess then sent her angelic warriors who defeated Aster and sealed him within the depths of the underworld.

Now, in the present day, a dark force seeks to revive the demon lord by searching for his human incarnation.

This story follows a young man named Elliot Winston, whose normal routine begins the journey to determine the fate of the world.

This game is unfinished, but more will be released over time.

As of right now, this build is simply a demo and a taste of the full game. As such, features that are present in the finished product are either missing or incomplete.
The story is still in development, so the game will advance over time with future updates.

Current Playtime: 15-30 minutes

Classic Turn-Based Battle System~: Experience a turn-based battle system similar to classic RPG Games such as Final Fantasy X or the Legend of Heroes series!

ZERO Random Encounters~: All enemies are visible on screen and you can score predictable Encounter Advantages by sneaking up behind them!

Multiple Side Quests~: Experience the world with various side quests to take on with varying difficulties and objectives!

Entrancing Original Artwork~: Featuring original artwork for each main character, including full CG graphical images.

This is also my first ever game to be released. As of now, I only use some default assets, with some original artwork (as well as a few edited sprites), but I do plan on making more original assets later down the road, as well as original music.

Thanks for playing my game, and I hope you all enjoy it!
